Text:
Theres so many sluts from all over the country that end up in porn. Just once I want to casually browse the latest updates at Kink.com, see a brand new girl & say 'OMG I totally went to High School with that slut.'
Or even better 'oh no way, its her I fucked that girl a few times in High School. I recognize the tramp stamp. Yep not surprised she was a slut.' Of course the downside would be 'Ah man we didnt get half as dirty as that. Oh well still fucked her'
Yep that would rule!
